item.title: Husband in au pair affair recounts killings of wife, man: "Hoping to de-escalate"
item.description: Brendan Banfield testified that he did not fatally stab his wife in 2023, but instead shot the man who did.

item.title: Remains, jacket found over 2 years after woman vanished in wilderness
item.description: Human remains and clothing were found while searching for Belgian national Celine Cremer, who went missing in 2023 in Tasmania, police said.

item.title: Dallas native, Olympic sprinter Sha'Carri Richardson arrested in Orlando for dangerous driving
item.description: Sha'Carri Richardson has been arrested in Orlando, Florida, for allegedly driving over 100 mph on Thursday.

item.title: 1/29: The Takeout with Major Garrett
item.description: President Trump avoids mention of Minneapolis, immigration in cabinet meeting; Sen. Amy Klobuchar announces bid for governor.

item.title: Lindsey Vonn crashes in final downhill before Winter Olympics
item.description: Skiing great Lindsey Vonn crashed in her final downhill before the Milan Cortina Winter Olympics.
